summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3756 for the improvement of 45th Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Edmunds Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 46238, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
